code: import api from'./api';export const subjectService={getAll:async()=>{return await api.get('/admin/subjects');},getById:async id=>{return await api.get("/admin/subjects/".concat(id));},create:async data=>{return await api.post('/admin/subjects',data);},update:async(id,data)=>{return await api.put("/admin/subjects/".concat(id),data);},delete:async id=>{return await api.delete("/admin/subjects/".concat(id));}};
